description:
With it being summer festival season, Haneru`s dad is all fired up about manning the drums during the Bunchaka Festival. But Haneru doesn`t want to help this year because he wants to focus on dance. This sets off a huge argument between the two, making the mood in the Tobitatsu home stormy in the middle of summer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haneru and Dad`s Stormy Summer Festival!
Haneru to Tou-chan: Haran no Natsumatsuri!
ハネルと父ちゃん 波乱の夏祭り!
